bio: Liquidity Manager & Optimizer - for V3 CL DEXs and Lending Protocols
impactDescription:
Aside from BSC (our native chain), OP and Base Chain are our top TVL chains right now

- On OP: 26 vaults. Launched Nov’22. TVL at $4.5M+ (ATH of $11M+ in Mar)
- key ecosystem vaults like OP and OP-ETH

- On Base: 22 vaults. Launched Sep’23. TVL at $1.2M+
- Supported Base LPs and vaults, eg USDbC, cbETH

Our ACLM maintained a tight range on V3 positions, hosting a big % of active liquidity on the pools managed. This facilitated better + bigger swap volumes on key tokens.

Metrics - Currently hosting:
90%+ of active liquidity on UniV3 for USDT/DAI, USDC/USDT
20%+ on wstETH/ETH
50%+ on USDC/USDbC

- We actively posted developments about OP in our socials, bringing user awareness to OP/Base
- Other initiatives: sharing our content to OP Discord, + sharing insights in OP community Spaces
contributionDescription:
- liquidity manager & yield optimizer launched 2020. Supported OP Mainnet since 2022
- brought in TVL via unique strategies that automate + inc. yields for users

- Single-Token Vaults: Optimized the leveraged same-token borrow/supply on lending protocols. Attracted users + TVL via our automation and consistent APY, no IL and no liquidation risks. Started with Sonne, then expanded to partner with dForce

- Automated Conc. Liquidity Manager (ACLM) Vaults: Simplified the process in bringing users to V3 CL DEXs - Users easily provide liquidity (no hassle of setting ranges or out-of-range worries) We automate the ranges and positions, offer single-token deposits, fully automated rebalancing

- We expanded to Base Chain this year. Integrated and brought TVL to Moonwell, Sonne, UniV3 and SushiV3

contributionLinks.description: Top yields and TVL for single-token vaults on Optimism

impactMetrics.description: Top 2 & 3 TVL Chains on our Dapp

fundingSources.description: No VC Funding or token sale at all

reportReason: I would appreciate someone looked into this
